comment: He really cares about his students and goes the extra mile by getting to know them! I loved his class and would definitely recommend taking him.

Super nice professor who really wants everyone to pass and is very flexible. He repeats himself a lot though. The use of the textbook is confusing, because he'll insist that you have it and bring it to class, but he'll only use it a few times during the semester.

Loved his class! I would definitely take it over. The only complaint is we only had one quiz and no tests, so there was really no way to know if you were prepared for the final. It was an easy A though!

TAKES ATTENDANCE FOR A GRADE! If you don't plan on coming, don't sign up for the class. Thick accent. Really likes when people participate and will occasionally call on you randomly. Homework every class, but he posts everything online and doesn't take much for a grade. Very tough class, but he tries to help every way he can. Pretty friendly.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK
